summary: The bill, titled the Creating Access to Necessary American-Canadian Duty Adjustments Act (CANADA Act), aims to exempt goods imported by or for small businesses from duties imposed by the national emergency declared on February 1, 2025, by the President. The bill specifically references Executive Orders 14193, 14197, and 14226. The bill was introduced in the Senate on July 22, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Finance.
